name: Bulkogi (Korean Barbecue)
ingredients: 1/4 cup granulated Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Partially freeze the beef for about an hour to make it easier to slice.
Slice the beef as thinly as possible against the grain. It should be in very thin slices, but not falling apart.
Mix all of the remaining ingredients except the lettuce to create the marinade.
Pour marinade over the meat and marinate for at least 1 hour, turning occasionally.
Preheat a contact-type grill or nonstick skillet.
Grill the meat in batches without closing the lid. Turn meat after a few seconds to brown the other side and remove to a serving plate; repeat with remaining meat.
Serve beef rolled up in lettuce leaves if desired.

notes: This recipe makes 6-8 servings. The beef can be frozen. You can saut√© the meat in a nonstick skillet if you don't have a contact-type grill. Nutritional information is provided for both 1/6 and 1/8 of the recipe.
